channel.title: 2 Errors (Adding control panel)
channel.description:
I have gotten two errors adding a control panel, if you could tell me what I did wrong it would help me thanks.
Thanks for help in advance...
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/827/14592635.png/][IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/1885/14592635.png[/img][/URL]

item.description:

Fixed all of it myself thanks. =p

item.title: 2 Errors (Adding control panel)
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Did you just copy and paste a tutorial? Because the reason is that it is just can not find what it’s looking for. Maybe you have to fix them yourself, I’m leading you in the right direction.

Try fixing the paths and/or imports.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Errors (Adding control panel)
item.dc:creator: @chris2244 chris2244
item.description:
@chris2244 wrote:

When I fixed that I got this. src\server\model\players\Player.java:142: isNpc is already defined in server.mod el.players.Player public boolean isNpc = false; ^ src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:359: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS location: class server.Config if(c.playerRights == 2 && !Config.ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS) { ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1020: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS location: class server.Config if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITE MS) || c.playerRights != 2) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Trade.java:28: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ADMIN_CAN_TRADE location: class server.Config if(c.playerRights == 2 && !Config.ADMIN_CAN_TRADE) { ^ src\server\util\ControlPanel.java:160: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SERVER_NAME location: class server.Config setTitle(Config.SERVER_NAME + " ControlPanel"); ^ src\server\util\ControlPanel.java:645: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SERVER_NAME location: class server.Config SERVER_NAME_TEXT.setText(Config.SERVER_NAME); ^ src\server\util\ControlPanel.java:648: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ADMIN_CAN_TRADE location: class server.Config ADMINS_CAN_TRADE.setSelected(Config.ADMIN_CAN_TRADE); ^ src\server\util\ControlPanel.java:653: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS location: class server.Config ADMINS_CAN_DROP.setSelected(Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS); ^ src\server\util\ControlPanel.java:658: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS location: class server.Config ADMINS_CAN_SELL_ITEMS.setSelected(Config.ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS); ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:173: appearanceUpdateRequired has private acc ess in server.model.players.Player c.appearanceUpdateRequir ed = true; ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:191: appearanceUpdateRequired has private acc ess in server.model.players.Player c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:339: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SERVER_NAME location: class server.Config Config.SERVER_NAME = p.SERVER_NAME_TEXT.getText(); ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:342: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ADMIN_CAN_TRADE location: class server.Config Config.ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = p.ADMINS_CAN_TRADE.isSelected() ; ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:343: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS location: class server.Config Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = p.ADMINS_CAN_DROP.isSelected() ; ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:344: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS location: class server.Config Config.ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = p.ADMINS_CAN_SELL_ITEMS.is Selected(); ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:403: appearanceUpdateRequired has private acc ess in server.model.players.Player c.appearanceUpdateRequired = tru e; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 16 errors Press any key to continue . . .

This is my player.java now.

[code]package server.model.players;

import server.Config;
import server.Server;
import server.World;
import server.model.items.Item;
import server.model.npcs.NPC;
import server.model.npcs.NPCHandler;
import server.model.region.Region;
import server.util.ISAACRandomGen;
import server.util.Misc;
import server.util.Stream;
import server.world.map.VirtualWorld;
import java.util.ArrayList;

public abstract class Player {

public ArrayList <String>killedPlayers = new ArrayList<String> ();
public ArrayList<String> lastKilledPlayers = new ArrayList<String>();
public ArrayList <Integer>attackedPlayers = new ArrayList<Integer> ();
public int betAmount = 0;
public String killOneName = "",
	killOneIp = "",
	killTwoName = "",
	killTwoIp = "",
	killThreeName = "",
	killThreeIp = "";
public boolean	
initialized = false,
shouldGetDrops = true,
disconnected = false,
ruleAgreeButton = false,
RebuildNPCList = false,
isActive = false,
isKicked = false,
isSkulled = false,
friendUpdate = false,
newPlayer = false,
hasMultiSign = false,
saveCharacter = false,
mouseButton = false,
splitChat = false,
chatEffects = true,
acceptAid = false,
nextDialogue = false,

usedSpecial = false,
mageFollow = false,
dbowSpec = false,
craftingLeather = false,
properLogout = false,
secDbow = false,
maxNextHit = false,
ssSpec = false,
vengOn = false,
addStarter = false,
accountFlagged = false,
isNpc = false,
msbSpec = false;[/code]

msbSpec = false,

The comma is supposed to be a ;

msbSpec = false;

See the difference?

item.title: 2 Errors (Adding control panel)
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[code=java]package server.model.players;

import server.Config;
import server.Server;
import server.World;
import server.model.items.Item;
import server.model.npcs.NPC;
import server.model.npcs.NPCHandler;
import server.model.region.Region;
import server.util.ISAACRandomGen;
import server.util.Misc;
import server.util.Stream;
import server.world.map.VirtualWorld;
import java.util.ArrayList;

public abstract class Player {

    public ArrayList <String>killedPlayers = new ArrayList<String> ();
    public ArrayList<String> lastKilledPlayers = new ArrayList<String>();
    public ArrayList <Integer>attackedPlayers = new ArrayList<Integer> ();
    public int betAmount = 0;
    public String killOneName = "",
            killOneIp = "",
            killTwoName = "",
            killTwoIp = "",
            killThreeName = "",
            killThreeIp = "";
    public boolean        
    initialized = false,
    shouldGetDrops = true,
    disconnected = false,
    ruleAgreeButton = false,
    RebuildNPCList = false,
    isActive = false,
    isKicked = false,
    isSkulled = false,
    friendUpdate = false,
    newPlayer = false,
    hasMultiSign = false,
    saveCharacter = false,
    mouseButton = false,
    splitChat = false,
    chatEffects = true,
    acceptAid = false,
    nextDialogue = false,
    autocasting = false,
    usedSpecial = false,
    mageFollow = false,
    dbowSpec = false,
    craftingLeather = false,
    properLogout = false,
    secDbow = false,
    maxNextHit = false,
    ssSpec = false,
    vengOn = false,
    addStarter = false,
    accountFlagged = false,
    msbSpec = false,
    isNpc = false;
    
    
    public int 
    KC,
    DC,
    firecape = 0,
    saveDelay,
    playerKilled,
    pkPoints,
    newAccountTimer = 0,
    totalPlayerDamageDealt,
    killedBy,
    lastChatId = 1,
    privateChat, 
    friendSlot = 0,
    dialogueId, 
    randomCoffin, 
    newLocation, 
    specEffect, 
    specBarId, 
    attackLevelReq, 
    defenceLevelReq, 
    strengthLevelReq, 
    rangeLevelReq, 
    magicLevelReq,
    followId, 
    skullTimer,
    safeTimer = 0, 
    votingPoints,
    nextChat = 0,
    talkingNpc = -1,
    dialogueAction = 0,
    autocastId,
    followDistance,
    followId2,
    barrageCount = 0,
    delayedDamage = 0,
    delayedDamage2 = 0,
    pcPoints = 0,
    magePoints = 0,
    desertTreasure = 0,
    lastArrowUsed = -1,
    clanId = -1,
    autoRet = 0,
    pcDamage = 0,
    xInterfaceId = 0,
    xRemoveId = 0,
    xRemoveSlot = 0,
    tzhaarToKill = 0,
    tzhaarKilled = 0,
    waveId,
    frozenBy = 0,
    poisonDamage = 0,
    teleAction = 0,
    bonusAttack = 0,
    lastNpcAttacked = 0,
    killCount = 0,
    npcId2 = 0;
	
	
    public String clanName, properName;
    public int[] voidStatus = new int[5];
    public int[] itemKeptId = new int [4]; 
    public int[] pouches = new int[4];
    public final int[] POUCH_SIZE = {3,6,9,12};
    public boolean[] invSlot = new boolean[28], equipSlot = new boolean[14];
    public long friends[] = new long[200];
    public double specAmount = 0;
    public double specAccuracy = 1;
    public double specDamage = 1;
    public double prayerPoint = 1.0;
    public int teleGrabItem, teleGrabX, teleGrabY, duelCount, underAttackBy, underAttackBy2, wildLevel, teleTimer, respawnTimer, saveTimer = 0, teleBlockLength, poisonDelay;
    public long lastPlayerMove,lastPoison,lastPoisonSip,poisonImmune,lastSpear,lastProtItem, dfsDelay, lastVeng,lastYell,teleGrabDelay, protMageDelay, protMeleeDelay, protRangeDelay, lastAction, lastThieve,lastLockPick, alchDelay, specDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(), duelDelay, teleBlockDelay, godSpellDelay, singleCombatDelay, singleCombatDelay2, reduceStat, restoreStatsDelay, logoutDelay, buryDelay, foodDelay, potDelay;
    public boolean canChangeAppearance = false;
    public boolean mageAllowed;
    public byte poisonMask = 0;
    public boolean isNpc = false;
    public int npcId2 = 0;
    public int memberStatus = 0;[/code]

You had an extra ; on line 59 and it was not declared as an int.
On 119 you did not declare the variable as a type.

I fixed it up for you ^

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Errors (Adding control panel)
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Instance variables have to be either initialized at the point of declaration or assigned inside a method (assuming this is what you’re doing).

Could you post the whole code?

Read full topic
